channel.title: HP Bar Problems
channel.description: I changed my npc to have more than normal hp, I changed a chicken to have 1500 hp. When attacking the chicken the hp bar reaches zero, all red, then it restores back to full green, and it does this about 3 or 4 times before the chicken is actually dead. Is there any way to make the HP Bar proportionate to the amount of hp the NPC has?

item.title: HP Bar Problems
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

It’s extremely hard to do but can be done. Your best option is to stick with what it does, which is fine. Going with a new client would be a lot of work to import all the work you’ve done on the original client.

I didn’t mean pick a new client… You just need to change a few lines of code on server and client. Or look in the server at how it sends the hitmasks and figure out a way change it to be a percentage

item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The client only uses 1 byte to represent hp in the hit mask, so you’ll either have to change the client or change the hitpoints to be sent as a percentage
